name: Scary pictures: Yavez - seven deadly sins
name_original: Scary pictures: Yavez - seven deadly sins
description:
The game "Scary pictures: Yavez - seven deadly sins" - will plunge you into the atmosphere of the classic and gloomy history of the Soviet times.



The happy parents of the protagonist, who have just fulfilled their dream, are not even aware of what their children faced after moving to a new home. The protagonist of the story will face many horrors and his childhood fears face to face. Laughter and joy will be replaced by creepy and nauseating feelings. The blue sky and the warm sun will turn into corridors and catacombs of an old, half-decayed building. Whether the main character will be saved and whether he will save his sister depends only on you.

  • Many choices
  • Eight game endings
  • Interesting story
  • Nostalgia
